meta.title: Welcome to City of New Brunswick, New jersey

meta.content: The Daily New Brunswick COVID 19 Report Radio Podcasts https www.cityofnewbrunswick.

li.a: "New Brunswick COVID-19 Report" - Daily Radio Podcasts
NB Public Schools - Coronavirus Advisory Page
Visit Parks, Gardens and Green Spaces

strong.br: The Daily "New Brunswick COVID-19 Report" Radio Podcasts:

font.strong: Sign Up for Up-to-the-Minute NIXLE ALERTS from Our Local Agencies to Your Cell Phone:
font.a: Text Your Zip Code to 888777 to Opt In

span.strong: New Brunswick Tomorrow Establishes "New Brunswick Community Response Fund"

br.br: City Planning Board to Meet by Electronic Teleconferencing on April 13, 2020

strong.font: Governor Signs Executive Order Closing All State and County Parks and Forests in Response to COVID-19

br.br: Retired Public Employees Invited to Return to Work to Assist in Fight Against COVID-19

br.span: City Office of Emergency Management Accepting Donations of Personal Protective Equipment
New Brunswick-based Johnson & Johnson Working to Supply 1 Billion Doses of COVID-19 Vaccine Worldwide

span.br: State Income Tax & Corporate Business Tax Filing Deadlines Extended to July 15

strong.span: City Department of Public Works Offering "No Contact" Service to Residents & Businesses

strong.br: With Access to Senior Resource Center Temporarily Restricted, Wellness Calls & Check-ins with City Seniors Continue
Governor Murphy Announces Mortgage Payment Relief & Financial Protections for Those Facing COVID-19 Hardship

br.br: Governor Murphy Calls for Retired Medical Workers to Assist State in Fight Against COVID-19
NJ Human Services Announces $70 Million in Food Assistance for Vulnerable Families

br.span: City Rent Control Office Working with Tenants & Landlords in the Midst of State-Ordered Eviction Moratorium
Alternate Side Parking Regulations to be Temporarily Suspended

font.strong: Recent Executive Order Modification Reclassifies Certain Business Categories as Essential

br.br: Important Planning & Zoning Applications & Other Forms Available Through City Website
City Hall Offers Residents Outdoor Drop Box to Collect Permits & Applications
Ability to Obtain Important Permits & Forms for Construction Work in the City Available Online
Mental Health Telephone Support Available During COVID-19 Outbreak
City Board and Agency Meeting Schedules
Residents Reminded to Practice Social Distancing When Visiting City Parks
Daily 30-Minute Radio Show to Provide COVID-19 Information
Statewide Stay at Home Order Announced by Governor Murphy
Governor Murphy Signs Legislation Prohibiting Employers from Terminating or Refusing to Reinstate Workers who Miss Work Due to Infectious Disease
Important Reminder Regarding Servcies for City Houses of Worship
State Enacts Suspension on Removals of Individuals due to Evictions or Foreclosures
City Department of Public Works Facilities to Limit Public Access but Services Will Continue

strong.br: Unemployment Assistance Likely for Residents Impacted by COVID-19

p.strong: Hub City Eateries Open and Ready to Serve
City Launches Comprehensive Web Page Offering Various COVID-19 Related Links
Residents and Patrons Encouraged to Continue to Support Businesses and Restaurants During Coronavirus Outbreaks
Beware of Individuals Going Door to Door Posing as CDC Representatives
Governor Murphy Declares State of Emergency, Public Health Emergency to Strengthen State Preparedenss to Contain the Spread of COVID-19
